    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Race getInstance()
        This Function is used to get an Instance of the Race. So the Activities have the ability to use Methods of this class without creating an Object from it.
        Returns:
        An Instance of a Race.

      • newRace

        public void newRace(Context context,
           int count,
           int mode,
           java.lang.Object track,
           int carStatus,
           java.util.List<java.lang.String> names,
           boolean ghostMode)
        This Method generates a new race with the given parameters count, mode, track, numberofplayers. These parameters are mapped to the appropriate member variables to make them usable during a race.
        Parameters:
        count - The Number of Round (Roundmode) or the Number of Minutes (Timermode) the race will have.
        mode - The gamemode for this race, wether Roundmode or Timermode.
        track - The track to drive on.
        numberofplayers - The Number of players on this track.

      • initRace

        public void initRace(Context c,
            TextView time)
        This Method sets variables to initialize the race. The given Context is used to initialize the MillisecondChronometer(Roundmode) with this context. The parameter time is used to set the timer value(Timermode).
        Parameters:
        c - The Context of the actual activity
        time - The TextView that represents the Timer during Timermode.

      • go

        public void go()
        This Method starts the Timer (Timermode) or the Counter (Roundmode). The truth value of mRaceStarted is set to TRUE.

      • isCorrectMovement

        public boolean isCorrectMovement(int lane,
                        boolean recognized)
        This Method determines if there is a correct movement for the given lane and logical value of recognized. For specific lane a correct movement happens when recognized was TRUE before it gets FALSE. When correct movement happens calcStatistics() is called.
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane to find correct movement.
        recognized - The truth value of recognized object on the frame.
        Returns:
        TRUE if there is a correct movement found, FALSE if no correct Movement is found.

      • hasRaceBeenStarted

        public boolean hasRaceBeenStarted()
        This Method is used to returns wether the race has been started or not.
        Returns:
        TRUE if race has been started, FALSE if race has not been started, has been canceled or stopped.

      • countRounds

        public void countRounds(int lane)
        This Method sets the actual Roundcounter + 1 for a specific lane.
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane on which the round has to be added.

      • isOver

        public int isOver()
        This Method is used to check if the race is over and gets the lane which matches the condition. During Roundmode this is implemented by a comparison of the actual round on every lane with the estimated rounds for the race. During Timermode this is realised by checking which lane got more rounds after isFinished() from MyTimer class returned True.
        Returns:
        Return the lane which ends the race first, 0 if race is still running.

      • getCurrentRound

        public int getCurrentRound(int lane)
        This Method return the actual round according to the given lane
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the round is needed.
        Returns:
        The value of the actual round.

      • getCurrentSpeed

        public double getCurrentSpeed(int lane)
        This Method gets the current speed according to the given lane.
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the speed is needed.
        Returns:
        The double value of the speed.

      • getTrackName

        public java.lang.String getTrackName()
        This Method gets the raced track name.
        Returns:
        The track name.

      • getGameMode

        public int getGameMode()
        This Method gets the game mode of this race.
        Returns:
        The game mode(ROUNDMODE|TIMERMODE).

      • getNumberOfPlayers

        public int getNumberOfPlayers()
        This Method returns the Number of Players that are driving in this race according to the car status.
        Returns:
        The number of players, 0 if there are no Player in the race.

      • getCount

        public int getCount()
        This Method gets the number of Rounds (ROUNDMODE) respectively the number of minutes (TIMERMODE).
        Returns:
        The number.

      • getAttempt

        public int getAttempt(int lane)
        This Method gets the attempt for the given player.
        Parameters:
        p - The Player for which the attempt is needed.
        Returns:
        The attempt, 0 if there is no Player found for this lane.

      • getDrivenMeters

        public double getDrivenMeters(int lane)
        This Method gets the driven meters during this race for the lane.
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the driven meters is needed.
        Returns:
        The driven meters.

      • getFastestRound

        public java.lang.String getFastestRound(int lane)
        This Method gets the fastest round for the given lane.
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the fastest round is needed.
        Returns:
        The fastest round after the race.

      • getAvgSpeed

        public double getAvgSpeed(int lane)
        This Method gets the average speed during the race according to the given lane.
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the avg speed is needed.
        Returns:
        The average speed.

      • getBestTime

        public de.freinsberg.pomecaloco.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getBestTime()
        This Method gets the best time measured as a pair of the time string and the according lane.
        Returns:
        The Pair of the time string and the lane.

      • getRoundGhostFinishedTime

        public java.lang.String getRoundGhostFinishedTime()

      • checkGhostTime

        public void checkGhostTime(java.lang.String time)

      • processResults

        public void processResults()
        This Method is used to put measured values into a database to use them after the race.

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        This Method is used to stop the race timers, when the race is cancelled manually. The truth value of mRaceStarted is set to FALSE.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        This Method is used, when the race is stopped properly. The Method processResults() is called. The truth value of mRaceStarted is set to FALSE.

      • getPlayerColor

        public org.opencv.core.Scalar getPlayerColor(int lane)
        This Method gets the players color as a Scalar according to the given lane. The value is get by using the method of the Player class.
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the color Scalar is needed.
        Returns:
        null when mPlayerArray is empty for this lane, else the color of the player according to the lane.

      • getPlayerRGBColor

        public int getPlayerRGBColor(int lane)
        This Method gets the players color as an integer-representative according to the given lane. The value is get by using the method of the Player class.
        Parameters:
        lane - The lane for which the integer-representative is needed.
        Returns:
        0 when mPlayerArray is empty for this lane, else the colors integer-representative of the player according to the lane.

      • getPlayerName

        public java.lang.String getPlayerName(int index)
        This Method gets the player name for the given index in the player array.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the needed player.

      • getFinishedTime

        public java.lang.String getFinishedTime()
        This Method gets a String that represents the Time when race is finished. When in a timer mode race, this String is set to "00:00:00", in round mode this String is set to the elapsed time on the Chronometer
        Returns:
